item.title: Biden to block all future oil drilling in 625 million acres of US oceans
item.description: President Joe Biden's landmark decision falls under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act.

item.description: Pope Francis is wrapping up a busy Christmas season

item.title: Congress is ready to certify Trump's election win, but Jan. 6 legacy hangs over day
item.description: Congress plans to convene amid a snowstorm to certify the 2024 election results for President-elect Donald Trump

item.title: Biden signs bill boosting Social Security payments for millions
item.description: President Joe Biden is set to sign into law a measure that boosts Social Security payments for current and former public employees
